File_Description: File-level metadata file describing files contained within this dataset.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for File-level Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Data dictionary defining column headers and other terms across the dataset.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for File-level Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Description of methods associated with installation/deployment of sensors. Includes location information.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Waterlevel (in meters) measurements for ER-PLM1 well. This data file has underwent QA/QC processes. Averaged for 5-minute resolution with duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers removed.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Waterlevel (in meters) measurements for ER-PLM1 well. This data file has underwent QA/QC processes. Averaged for 1-hour resolution with duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers removed.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Waterlevel (in meters) measurements and DateTime for ER-PLM1 well. This data file has underwent QA/QC processes. Averaged for daily resolution with duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers removed.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Waterlevel (in meters) measurements and DateTime for ER-PLM6 well. This data file has underwent QA/QC processes. Averaged for 5-minute resolution with duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers removed.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Waterlevel (in meters) measurements and DateTime for ER-PLM6 well. This data file has underwent QA/QC processes. Averaged for 1-hour resolution with duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers removed.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Waterlevel (in meters) measurements and DateTime for ER-PLM6 well. This data file has underwent QA/QC processes. Averaged for daily resolution with duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers removed.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Original data for ER-PLM1 with flagging of duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: Original data for ER-PLM6 with flagging of duplicated values, NAs, and abnormal/bad/outliers.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata v1.0.0

File_Description: ReadMe file with high-level organization of files contained within dataset (in Microsoft Word docx format). Details of goals of QA and QC, input files used, and output files are contained within this ReadMe file.
ReadMe file with high-level organization of files contained within dataset (in pdf format). Details of goals of QA and QC, input files used, and output files are contained within this ReadMe file.
R script for QA/QC of water levels in PLM1 and PLM6 used to QA/QC the data from these wells.
